Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
public class Island extends Object
Class representing a single island or more island connected together

  • Method Details

    • getOwner

      public Player getOwner()
      Getter method of the owner of the island. It determines the player who controls it and so the color of towers. Can be null if is not owned by anyone
      Returns:
      The player who owns the island or null

    • setOwner

      public void setOwner(Player newOwner)
      Sets the owner of the island.
      Parameters:
      newOwner - the player to set as owner

    • getNumberOfTowers

      public int getNumberOfTowers()
      Gets the number of towers on the island. If the number is more than one it means the island is composed by more islands connected
      Returns:
      the number of towers on the island

    • setNumberOfTowers

      public void setNumberOfTowers(int numberOfTowers)
      Sets the number of towers on the island.
      Parameters:
      numberOfTowers - number of isalnds to set.

    • removeTowers

      public void removeTowers()
      Method removeTowers remove all the towers on the island

    • getBanCards

      public int getBanCards()
      gets the number of ban cards on the island
      Returns:
      the number of ban cards on the island

    • setBanCards

      public void setBanCards(int banCards)
      Sets the number of ban cards on the island

    • addBanCard

      public void addBanCard()
      Method addBanCard adds a banCard on the Island

    • removeBanCard

      public void removeBanCard()
      Method removeBanCard removes a banCard on the Island

    • isBanCardPresent

      public Boolean isBanCardPresent()
      Method isBanCardPresent checks if there are some banCard on the Island
      Returns:
      true if there are some banCard on the island, false if there aren't banCard on the island

    • addStudents

      public void addStudents(Color color, int studentsNumber)
      Method addStudents adds students of the selected Color
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the students that I want to add
      studentsNumber - the number of the students that I want to add

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Color student)
      Method addStudent add a students of the selected Color
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student that I want to add

    • getSelectedStudents

      public int getSelectedStudents(Color color)
      Returns the number of students of the chosen color
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the students of which I want to know the number
      Returns:
      the number of students of the chosen color

    • hasSameOwner

      public boolean hasSameOwner(Island isl)
      Checks if the given island has the same owner
      Parameters:
      isl - island to be checked
      Returns:
      true if they have the same owner, false if they have different owner or the island checked has no owner
